data.title: Arizona Christian University Hourly Pay Rate
data.meta_description: How much does an Arizona Christian University employee salary on average per hour? Explore the company details, job salaries, location differences, and salary reviews.
data.text:
View salary at Arizona Christian University by Job Title BETA

The average salary of Arizona Christian University jobs will vary depending on the location, industry, category, and department. The table below shows the job titles you might be interested in and the hourly salary range of different positions at Arizona Christian University. A difference in pay for the same job title may be based on a number of factors, such as experience, training, level of education, skills and competencies, and so on. Program Director Paradise Valley Area jobs at Arizona Christian University earn the most with an average hourly salary of $102, while Caregiver jobs earn the least with an average hourly salary of $0.

The estimate average salary for Arizona Christian University employees is around $39 per hour. The highest earners in the top 75th percentile are paid over $44. Individual salaries will vary depending on the job, department, and location, as well as the employeeâ€™s level of education, certifications, and additional skills.
